form.name: hiv_infection_five
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC HIV Infection> HIV Infection Five

field.name: If mother has confirmed HIV infection and child is HIV uninfected:
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding according to the feeding recommendations for healthy children
Counsel mother about her own health
Counsel mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Counsel mother/caregiver when to return for the next routine visit
Counsel mother/caregiver on other areas based on their needs and age of child
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
If mother and child are both HIV uninfected:
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding according to the feeding recommendations for healthy children
Counsel mother about her own health
Counsel mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Counselmother/caregiver when to return for the next routine visit
Counsel mother/caregiver on other areas based on their needs and age of child
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
